website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some quality issues and minor inconveniences, it offers mid-sized capacity, few false triggers, and an appealing design.
pros: Stands out for its dual butterfly lids with soft-close function
The slim rectangular design fits nicely in corners and along walls
cons: Sensor failures have been reported by several users
Bags are a bit difficult to change, and the clasp that holds them in place has been known to break
Requires 6 AA batteries – more than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Defective - buyer beware!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The lid stopped working within 5 months of purchase. Not worth the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Great for low clearance, but terrible to remove bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it was the only one that met the clearance restrictions under my counter. I absolutely hate the design on the top rim of the can. It rolls inward and prevents the bag from sliding out easily. We tear the majority on the full bags that we take out of the can because they catch on the top rim. I also hate the size of the opening. The batteries and motor take up too much area so the size of the hole where the trash can be deposited is limited. The motion sensor works fine and the doors open fully and quickly so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you even can anymore...lid won't last 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This served it's purpose for about 5 months...now the lid won't open. Changed the batteries out on the unit but the lid still won't open unless you physically press the open button. This defeats the purpose of this trash can if you have to press the open and close button every time. Too bad it can't be returned, as I'm extremely displeased that it barely lasted 5 months and didn't survive to the first battery change.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Would give no stars delivered in terrible condition not even operable can’t get lid out of can as its stuck and can itself extremely dented. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice trash for the price and quality. It did not disappoint. We have had for 6 months now and still on same set of batteries with normal average usage. It has a very sleek design, white kitchen bags fit perfectly around the top and the design holds the bag in so no problems with slipping bags. Overall I would buy this again in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: BAG RIPS ON HANDLE!!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is in a HORRIBLE PLACE! It rips the bag every time you try to remove it! Terrible design for a very expensive garbage can!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NewYorkStateOfMind

customer_reviews.title: can't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Handle catches on bag when you remove and rips it every time. Needs a redesign, can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and good size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard of these cans eating through batteries. This one lasted about 8 months on Harbor Freight batteries. Nice looking and good size.
customer_reviews.author: glen

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is not working the Motion detection is not working. Does this product have any warrantee I bought it in April ?
customer_reviews.author: Helena Van Nuys

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2nd one I've purchased, returned the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased, returned the first b/c motion sensor doesn't work and didn't on the second one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very modern and looks nice in the kitchen! Everyone loves how cool it is and how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: The unit that holds the garbage bag broke on one side so I now just ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit that holds the garbage bag broke on one side so I now just put the bag over the main unit otherwise I like the unit very much. It opens and closes nicely. It is fairly easy to take out the bag now. Best of all my doberman hasn't figured out how to open it. It's a good product for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awkward size. It's a square not rectangle as picture shows
customer_reviews.author: Kim Smotts

customer_reviews.title: First one shipped the lid didnt open requested a replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: First one shipped the lid didnt open requested a replacement through Amazon. Replacement worked for about two months and now the lid stopped working again. Just stick with the traditional lid with the step.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good trash can, but there is something on the sides which makes it difficult to remove the full bag.
customer_reviews.author: PThia

customer_reviews.title: Small, but Nice
customer_reviews.text: Con: Smaller than expected and arrived bent, fortunately that part is hidden against the wall. Pro: Its very nice looking, sleek, easy to operate and hides the trash bag well Would have given this 4 stars if it didnt arrive bent. 4 stars bc its small, esp the automatic lid opening (very small) compared to most trash cans, in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: The sensor works well but sometimes the top cover doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The sensor works well but sometimes the top cover doesn't work well, gets stuck and doesn't open I have to adjust for this to work and happens very often
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very small, this is NOT a 13 gallon can. Another person wrote: "Be careful with this item! It is not 50L! It is simply a 30L, with the box and labeling of a 50L (except they forgot one)! Attach is a picture of the can next to my 40L rash can on the left. It is clearly smaller..."
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 months after purchase and multiple broken parts!! BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: Revising my review. Purchased this less than 8 months ago and the lid mount has broken under its own opening power and now won't shut as a result. The batteries have needed replaced monthly which is horrible for 6 AA batteries. Lastly the bag holding insert rings broke from the frame within 3 months of purchase. There was no rough use, too expensive to fail so miserably!!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have all the pieces
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with a lid closure to hold batteries in place so they fall out into the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Can never get bag out of the can. Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: julie m stults

customer_reviews.title: Better than I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really want a motion sensor trash can, but I wanted a stainless steel option that fit into a very specific space I had in my kitchen. This trash can happened to be significantly cheaper than the similar sized "SimpleHuman" stainless steel trash can that had a foot pedal opener. Pros: The Batteries last almost a year Sensor and motors have been very reliable Looks great Cons: Getting the bags out and replacing them is not as easy as it could be The unit can't sit directly under a counter as that will trip the sensor and it will keep opening and closing
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Smeby

customer_reviews.title: small openings requiring a jeweler's precision when throwing away stuff like used floss
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my bathroom to replace one of those small, foot pedal design ones. Works perfectly well, reacts to no false triggers, and it really does alleviate all the frustrations that I as shooting for (noise, can trash can moving around when you open it, inconsistent mechanical movement, small openings requiring a jeweler's precision when throwing away stuff like used floss, etc) I love how slim it is and how it's possible to squeeze it into tight spaces if you measure right (see photo). Uses AA batteries which are very cheap in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Victor V Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two. One for garbage, one for recycling. They are awesome! We are a family of 4 and have had these 6+ months and have not had to replace the batteries once!! Work every time and have had no problems with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina V.

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight, easy-to-clean, stainless steel trash can
customer_reviews.text: Motion sensor, touchless, trash can. Downside it is costly, upside is light weight, very easy to keep clean, doesn’t retain odors like plastic trash bins, and you won’t have to replace this one like you would plastic ones. Also, the trash bag doesn’t show when it is placed properly in bin, so it stays looking sleek. I pondered over getting this type of bin for years, I’m glad I finally made the change.
customer_reviews.author: pea dee

customer_reviews.title: Haunted Trash
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these October of last year. About 3 months ago it became "haunted" randomly opening and closing with no one near it. We tried changing the batteries, it seemed a little better for a few days and then back to randomly opening and closing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: less or no cleaning the wasted basket due to fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: One simple word "CLEAN" less hand washing, less or no cleaning the wasted basket due to fingerprints, you know those hard to get rid of kids prints encrusted with jelly, peanut butter and anything else they or anyone gets their hands into.
customer_reviews.author: TommyBear

customer_reviews.title: The black stainless steel is a beautiful finish!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new dishwasher in the new "black stainless steel". Since my old white plastic trash can just didn't look right sitting by it, I searched Amazon to see if they actually made a trash can in this same finish. I was hesitant to order this, as I just wasn't sure it would hold as much as my old one, or match my dishwasher. But, I am so glad I ordered this! The finish is beautiful and I LOVE that it is hands free, so when my hands are wet or yucky, I don't mess up the finish, or soil my trash can. Now I have a trash can that looks as classy as my new dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a rectangle garbage can for months and this fit the bill. I needed it to fit underneath my kitchen island, out of the way. Easy to set up, bags fit in great, only complaint is the opening could be a little bigger but we will get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: THE LID BROKE BEFORE THE 30 DAY RETURN POLICY. ...
customer_reviews.text: THE LID BROKE BEFORE THE 30 DAY RETURN POLICY. "ACHILLES TRADE" THEY WOULDN'T HELP REFUND OR EXCHANGE! NOW I'M STUCK WITH AN $80 PAPER WEIGHT
customer_reviews.author: Lexman1977

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than 50 liters! 30 not 50
customer_reviews.text: Far from 50 liters, I have a 45 liter that broke and replaced with this one, my 45 makes this look tiny... not cool
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It came within 2 days and was packed very well
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy my new Mirage trash can. It was packed in two boxes and very easy to set up. It is a pleasure not to have to touch the dirty pail. I would recommend everyone to get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: chefsandi99

customer_reviews.title: Finally a narrow enough trash bin for our small kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's hard finding a nice looking narrow trash can for our small kitchen. It works fine with regular kitchen garbage bags. Easy to clean and operates well. The sensor range is close enough so that when we walk by it, it doesn't accidentally open. So far, we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to load and change! Batteries last! Good size too!
customer_reviews.author: martha ross

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Item was the same as advertised. Works well- lightweight yet sturdy. Easy to remove used trash bags. Very sleek style.
customer_reviews.author: Char H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and touchless aspect, but the sensor is pretty sensitive directly over the waste basket - up to 12 inches. I put it in a niche that had an overhead shelf, which kept causing the lid to open. On the one hand, the sensor isn't pointing out so that you activate it just by walking by, but it would be nice to be able to put the can under a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Erikson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Goes through batteries like crazy! We just take the entire top off because it becomes useless and a money pit. There is also nitches on the inside of the container that catch on the bag every time you try to pull it out. Save yourself the headache
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a find
customer_reviews.text: Good Grief, why didn't I get this sooner! The wide opening is great. I was a little hesitate thinking about the cost plus continually buying batteries. I suggest kicking caution to the wind. worth it. You don't have worry about touching the top, especially if you have something in your hand to discard. A tip, if you are not having guests over or cooking less (like in summer), turn it off, to prolong battery life, use it manually. It also masks odors well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item almost a year ago and it looks and works fine! I absousley love it!
customer_reviews.author: Martina N. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can tell you that look great in the kitchen.............love it
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Trash
customer_reviews.text: I am on the 3rd trash can. First one worked for a month, second for a few weeks and 3rd doesn't work out of the box. Completely frustrating and baffling. I'll be returning this one too.
customer_reviews.author: joanne c sismondo

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and how it functions
customer_reviews.text: i received this today. Love the look and how it functions. The only problem is it was supposed to come with batteries but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Doty

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than one month
customer_reviews.text: The lid no longer opens. We liked this product but it broke in less than one month of use. The lid won't open any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy Looking!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and works like a champ. A bit more work ti change the bag than in my cheap plastic can, but the appearance is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: but it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: It is more difficult to change trash bags than a non auto opening can, but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brydon D.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first 2 days...and now its crap. Top stays open when you want it closed and won't open when you need it to. JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: sharon la masney

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this trash can at the end of September. It worked great up until the battery ran out with no indication other than it was not opening. I changed the batteries out immediately but the sensor is not allowing the lid to open. It is only opening half way. We now have to push the button to open which defeats the purpose of this $80 can that is touch less. It still closes fine but opening is not so much....
customer_reviews.author: Catherine deBlieux

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. I liked the slim design although 13 gallon capacity. The sensor works well and it is easy to put and take out the trash bag. Update: I've been using this for over 2 years now and my children have been flipping and slapping the automatic lids all the time and it is still going strong no issues with the sensor or the lids. I change the batteries every 10 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Lara M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, good size. Part broke, but they replaced it for free.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hausler

customer_reviews.title: Check the size of the can
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller trash can than I thought. I was looking for the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Boom

customer_reviews.title: I love this can
customer_reviews.text: had it for two years, I love this can. there have no issues at all with the can. visual aspects are appealing and it keeps odors in the can. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: sh63

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't open all the way!
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating! It's a nice looking can but the sensors are not working well or only opens part way. I checked to make sure there wasn't garbage in the way, changed the batteries and it still only opens half. Not happy. Pictures shows how much it opens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to remove bag gets stuck have to fight to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Holds trash and operates well.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it holds trash. The auto open/close is great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! Worth every penny if you hate to touch the trash can...
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy another.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It was intended for organics waste and was a good choice. It sometimes does close sooner than I'd like. Will need to figure that out. Can is working well as designed!
customer_reviews.author: M. B

customer_reviews.title: Not 50L!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this item! It is not 50L! It is simply a 30L, with the box and labeling of a 50L (except they forgot one)! Attach is a picture of the can next to my 40L rash can on the left. It is clearly smaller...
customer_reviews.author: Sherm

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: IT IS GREAT IN MY NEW KITCHEN. THE ONLY PROBLEM IS THE WAY THE ITEM IS CONSTRUCTED DOES NOT MATCH THE INSTRUCTIONS THAT CAME WITH IT. YOU NEED TO UPDATE YOUR INFO THAT IS SENT OUT WITH THE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can. It fits perfectly in my kitchen and I love the ease of the opening/closing feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The piece that holds the trash bag in broke and can't put a lot of trash in it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it was easy enough to smooth out
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! The side was a bit dented when I received it, but it was easy enough to smooth out. Otherwise would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan. I've had this for a little over a month and think it's great. I'm still on my first set of batteries so FYI they last at least a month. Looks and feels very nice... worth the extra few dollars to get this.
customer_reviews.author: Strozeski’s

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it does not close when it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Boyum

customer_reviews.title: Spending $100 for a garbage can that lasts 6 weeks is very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Well, it lasted 6 weeks. Now, lid mechanism does not work amymore. I changed batteries twice but still does not work. Spending $100 for a garbage can that lasts 6 weeks is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: IsaNYC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Compared to cheaper models from the same company, this is totally a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Love

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Already broke, don't waste your money on this garbage can!!! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't consistently open all the way
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for little over a year and the lid has stopped opening all the way consistently. Replaced batteries, cleaned and teflon sprayed the hinges. Sometimes they open all the way and sometimes they don't. It was fun while it lasted, but I wouldn't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthews/Manning

customer_reviews.title: New designs...never as good as the first.
customer_reviews.text: New design...handles inside interfere with the bag. Not sure why they changed it...bad idea.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality and great price! However it can be a challenge to get the bag in place on the black folding flaps inside so we just switched to wrapping it around the black removable edge and letting the bag show a bit.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensitive Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and it is very inexpensive compared to the competition. Have been using for a couple of years w/o any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Grandfather42

customer_reviews.title: NOT for enclosed spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I had the larger version at my old place, and it lasted a good 5 years before the lid broke off. But in my new place I need a can that can fit in the pantry under a shelf. Unfortuntately, that combination totally blows this trash cans robot mind. The lid stays open all the time and never closes, running down the battery, so it's pretty useless for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Love Always...Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved this can a first but now 5 months after using the lid is only slightly working.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: NO INSIDE PLASTIC CONTAINER
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, the motion sensor works great but there is no inside plastic container. Without inside container cleaning it for drips from inside is a nightmare. I now use it in the loft only for dry trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit K

customer_reviews.title: Too small for an office..
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot smaller than we anticipated. Not sure if we will keep it for our office.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw.  Can fails to do a basic function.
customer_reviews.text: A design flaw in this product kills a basic requirement of any garbage can: the ability to remove a full trash bag! There's a rolled lip around the top that catches the bag, making it difficult to lift up and out. I commonly experience small rips in bags as I tug a and pull and tug some more. I swear, though, the day a bag rips apart and the garbage ends up all over the floor, I'll "eat" the $80 and toss this in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: after 3 months opening and closing functionality is lost. ...
customer_reviews.text: after 3 months opening and closing functionality is lost. ( I use my hand to open and close ).
customer_reviews.author: AveryNailBoutique

customer_reviews.title: The handle on the back and the bag retainer make ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the back and the bag retainer make it impossible to get the bag out with ripping it if you don’t have another person to help. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Speedfast

customer_reviews.title: First is the fact that it is difficult to remove a full garbage bag because the plastic bag gets hung up on ...
customer_reviews.text: The motion sensor and door mechanisms work as promised. The 3-star rating is based upon two seemingly small issues. First is the fact that it is difficult to remove a full garbage bag because the plastic bag gets hung up on the handle cutout. Second is the extremely small amount of resistance it takes to stop the door from opening. If the door accidentally hits the edge of a wet paper towel while opening, it stops. Other than these two minor issues, we like the product and would likely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Martin

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine, but was smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine, but was smaller than I expected. I wanted this trash can for the kitchen and it simply wasn't big enough for our family use. Also the lid was poorly designed, the battery pack took up a large portion of the actual trash opening so the actual opening was very small, I couldn't even fit my dust pan to throw away whatever I swept off the kitchen floor, was kind of annoying. But the product itself wasn't bad and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: It quit working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a nice product, but it quit working after 1 year, about 1 week after the warranty expired. I don't think a product this expensive should break after 1 year. I think it should work longer!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The sensor on the first one stopped working after about 1 1/2 years. I really liked it, so I ordered another one. Sensor completely confused on this one. Have used two new sets of batteries. Sensor buttons just keep flashing red. Sorry, can't advise buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Trash Can I've Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this can. I've had it a few months now. I can't believe I said I love a trash can. Its narrow, and fits at the end of a counter without sticking out. It takes standard bags, is easy to change the bags, and it opens and closes like magic, so it stays clean all the time. And heavy enough so my smallish dogs can't knock it over. Some of my Christmas guests were mesmerized waving their hands over it. They'll probably be ordering one too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Zenpup

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Gave this can a fair chance. It is a pain. The lip of the metal bin opening curves inward. Major design flaw. Full trash bags get caught on the curved lip. Cannot pull them out, and they rip. Emtying the can is a major pain.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great for use as clothes hamper
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, it is harder to bend over to do things, so I hijacked this great, attractive touchless kitchen trashcan to use in my bathroom as a clothes hamper. Now I don’t have to bend over to open a lid. Wave clothes over the sensing area and the lid pops open! In go the clothes. Thanks, technology!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and the outside stays clean and smudge free
customer_reviews.text: Works well, expect to use more bags then you would with a conventional can as you simply can not fill them all the way. Looks good and the outside stays clean and smudge free. The 2 downsides - there is a handle for the can on the side that sticks into the interior making removing even a half full bag tricky. Also, the motor housing is prone to getting dirty from throwing things out - ours is in the kitchen so food particles and other debris need to be cleaned off it often. Great for a house that maybe isn't heavy into cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Really love these!
customer_reviews.text: These garbage cans are great. I live that they open from the center as opposed to one side. I also love that you can push the open symbol and the lid will stay open until u push the close symbol. Could the cans be bigger? Yes, but for the price of these they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this trash can. Was a little hesitant to purchase for the price but glad I went ahead and splurged. Very nice to have hands free opening.
customer_reviews.author: IslandGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I have owned this for 3 months now and it works great (hands free) and I haven't had to change the batteries yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super misleading.
customer_reviews.text: It says 50L but it is for sure 30L. It takes 6 batteries which is more than the actual 50L touchless trashcan we already have. Super misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: I love my automatic sensor garbage can
customer_reviews.text: I love my automatic sensor garbage can. It is very sleek and good looking. I did not want a curved garbage can. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: ... had this trash can for over a year and LOVE it. I don't know why all the negative ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this trash can for over a year and LOVE it.I don't know why all the negative reviews.It workd like a dream and it hold my plastic bags in place,I DO recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: diane jones

customer_reviews.title: Could be taller.
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as I would have liked. Wife hates it. We had a motion sensor can in the past. Seemed to work better than this one. Does look sharp. Works about 7/10 of where I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best electronic trash cans I have had...But buy it at Costco, it's way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! The only thing that sucks is you think every trash can should do this after having one and you have to remember to open or step on the bottom to open!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Coates

customer_reviews.title: Not For Enclosed Drawers
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is not a good idea if you are wanting it for use in a pull out "trash drawer". It will open before you get the drawer open and will hang up. If you are wanting to use it in an open area, this can would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: I love that it counts down to when it's going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. I purchased two of these at the same time and both are working perfectly. I love that it counts down to when it's going to close. Opens and closes very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can. It works so well, and it looks very good in our kitchen. It lets us know when it is closing, and it is very quiet. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: THINKING OUTSIDE THE CAN
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of washcloths and towels; so, I purchased this product to use as a dirty clothes hamper. This product works great for my purpose and it looks great as well.. Additionally, I am happy with how the sensor works. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: sensor issues
customer_reviews.text: opens when it feels like it or not at all
customer_reviews.author: lorene harris

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time, please look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this can because it was highly rated for keeping dogs out but my dog got into it the second day! I also returned the item TWICE because it was broken and one returned product had the return slip from the previous customer! Not to service OR product I expected. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: L Davis

product_meta.title: EKO 92775-1 Phantom Motion Sensor Touchless Stainless Steel Trash Can | 50 Liter
product_meta.description: EKO 50 L Phantom sensor trash can is the perfect 13-gallon kitchen trash can for a busy home. It's a smart trash can, which means it helps you keep your home clean and tidy. But most impressive is its butterfly lid with its unique opening. It has 2 sets of hinges and opens from the middle out. This means that that the lid is smaller, so the trash can fit more comfortably inside some cabinets and under cabinets. The trash can has sensors built into the lid so that you can open the lid with the Wave of your hand, or elbow when your hands are full. So you can quickly empty plates and deposit trash--all without ever touching the trash can. The lid closes automatically, softly and quietly. The can also has touch button open and close. Your trash can, your preference. The can has a sleek exterior is Stainless Steel, with a fingerprint resistant finish that stays looking cleaner longer. It has a vented plastic base for easy cleaning and odor control. And, best of all, it has an intelligent bag system that creates less mess than ever. The removable rim secures your disposable plastic liner in place. The rim has to folding interior handles to wrap your bag around. The handles then fold down and lock into place. Grip the same handles to lift your bag out and empty the trash! it's clean, convenient, and smart. This Phantom sensor trash can streamlines waste management, so your home stays clean with less effort. The EKO Phantom sensor trash can is 24.57 inches high, 14.76 inches wide, and 9.84 inches deep and holds 50 L (13 gallons).
feature_bullets: LARGE STAINLESS STEEL 50 L (13 gallons) automatic sensor trash can for hands-free, hygienic, and efficient waste disposal
SOFT-CLOSE LID with butterfly open; Does not include liner or batteries (requires 6 AA)
BATTERY OPERATED: requires 6 AA batteries; Simple interface with on/off switch,  touch open/close, and auto-close lid (closes after 5 seconds)
REMOVABLE RIM holds trash bag in place and allows for easy removal and replacement
FOR OPTIMAL SENSOR USE trash can must be placed in an open area not under counters
